com.k2.Wiget

Class WigetAssembly<F extends WigetFamily<O>,O,W extends Wiget,T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.k2.Wiget.WigetAssembly<F,O,W,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    F - The wiget family
    O - The output type
    W - The type of the assemblies root wiget
    T - The requires type of this assemblies root wiget.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TemplateAssembly, TestWigetAssembly

    public class WigetAssembly<F extends WigetFamily<O>,O,W extends Wiget,T>
extends java.lang.Object
    A wiget assmbly is an hierarchy of assembled wigets. Each assembled wiget in the hierarchy is linked directly to the wiget assembly and as such the wiget assemble can be used to provide support services such a indexing and indentation to wigets in the assembly.
    Author:
    simon

      O output(java.lang.Object dataSource, O out)
      Output the root assembled wiget and all of its contained wigets into the given instance of the output type using the given data source object

    • Method Detail

      • factory

        public WigetFactory<F,O> factory()
        Returns:
        The wiget factory used to supply wigets implementations in this family

      • root

        public AssembledWiget<F,O,W,T> root()
        Returns:

      • output

        public O output(java.lang.Object dataSource,
                O out)
        Output the root assembled wiget and all of its contained wigets into the given instance of the output type using the given data source object
        Parameters:
        dataSource - The object to use as the datasource for the wiget assembly
        out - The instance of the ouptut type in which to output the wiget assembly
        Returns:
        The instance of the output type after outputting the assembly
